{"id":954256924,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1684639892,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"7 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/954256924/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum String Length After Removing Substrings","memory":"43.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minLength(String s){\n       List<Character> ls= new ArrayList<>();\n        for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++){\n            ls.add(s.charAt(i));\n        }\n        \n        \n        int idx=0;\n      while(idx<ls.size()-1){\n         \n        \n          if((ls.get(idx)=='A' && ls.get(idx+1)=='B')||(ls.get(idx)=='C' && ls.get(idx+1)=='D') ){\n              \n              ls.remove(idx);\n              ls.remove(idx);\n              idx=0;\n          }\n          else{\n              idx++;\n          }\n      }\n          return ls.size();\n       \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-string-length-after-removing-substrings","has_notes":false}
